summary:
People and organisational development is my passion. Business orientated, enthusiastic, result driven, structured and dedicated in making a social impact, improving employee relationships, attitude, engagement and therefore performance of workforce and organization. 

My greatest strength is inspiring and empowering people and business to reach and exceed their potential.

What my employees say about me: they feel appreciated and are given room to grow.
What my leadership team says about me: dedicated and solve every problem without any hassle (and a smile). 


CONTACT: :
haris.achterberg@outlook.com
+31 (0) 6 20 36 52 10 

EXPERTISE: learning & development, HRD, operation management, leadership, ownership, change management, cultural change, talent development, talent management programs design, stakeholder management, compensation and benefits, diversity and inclusion, Dutch and German employment/labour law, business strategy
